wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Harris (18 September 1905 - March 1985) was an English footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He was born in Ince-in-Makerfield, Lancashire. He played for Skelmersdale United, Wigan Borough, and Manchester United.

response: *Tom Harris (botanist) (1903–1983), palaeobotanist and academic at the University of Reading in the UK
*Tom Harris (film producer), producer of The Cross and the Switchblade
*Tom Harris (football manager), manager of Notts County F.C. between 1893 and 1913.
*Tom Harris (mechanical engineer) (born 1953), Canadian Executive Director, International Climate Science Coalition
*Tom Harris (musician), bass player for Detroit rock band Frijid Pink
*Tom Harris, known as Tattoo Tom (born 1983), British tattoo artist and activist
